entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
